item.title: Ram Mandir, Ayodhya, Uttar Pradesh (© Ritesh Shukla/Stringer/Getty Images)
item.description: 图文来源自：bing. copyright: © Ritesh Shukla/Stringer/Getty Images Today we look up at the stunning structure of Ram Mandir at Ayodhya! The partially built Hindu temple is known as the birthplace of Lord Rama. The details of Rama’s birth are chronicled in ancient scriptures like the Ramayana and the Mahabharata. According to these texts, he was born to Queen Kausalya and King Dasharatha.
